description:
net/http: log handler panic before closing HTTP connection

Fix originally from rogpeppe in 5414048 but was rolled
back due to test breakage.

This CL makes the test more robust to order of operations.

Fixes issue 2480 again.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=597cb8855ecc ***

net/http: log handler panic before closing HTTP connection

Fix originally from rogpeppe in 5414048 but was rolled
back due to test breakage.

This CL makes the test more robust to order of operations.

Fixes issue 2480 again.

R=golang-dev, gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5536072

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

subject: code review 5536072: net/http: log handler panic before closing HTTP connection
